copy.genericerror: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.

yourmagicalmembership.span: Your Game Card has been redeemed on the account [account name]. Your Fairies will now enjoy the benefits of Membership in Pixie Hollow for one month.

whatcani.span: What can I do as a Member?

asamember.span: As a Member, you'll gain access to all of the Fairy fun in the Hollow. Hit the shops, tailor your own fashions to add to your wardrobe, embark on exciting Fairy quests, and more!

whathappenswhen.span: What happens when this Membership expires?

pleasenotethat.span: Please note that your Game Card Membership expires on [expiration date].

copy.title: Congratulations! You're a Member!
copy.yourmagicalmembershipGC: Your Game Card has been redeemed on the account [account name]. Your Fairies will now enjoy the benefits of Membership in Pixie Hollow for one month.
copy.pleasenotethatGC: Please note that your Game Card Membership expires on [expiration date].
copy.yourmagicalmembershipMM: Your Magical Membership Card has been redeemed on the account [account name]. Your Fairies will now enjoy the benefits of Membership in Pixie Hollow for one month.
copy.pleasenotethatMM: Please note that your Membership expires on [expiration date].
copy.recurringBillingNotice: Memberships to Pixie Hollow are recurring and will continue to be billed until cancelled.
